import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { Grid, Typography, Avatar, TextField, Checkbox, FormControlLabel } from '@material-ui/core' import LockOutlinedIcon from '@material-ui/icons/LockOutlined'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import './Login.css' import { Modal, Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import { UserContext } from './UserProvider' const Login = () => { const { show, handleClose, forgotSubmit, setForgotEmail, handleSubmit, setEmail, setPassword, handleShow } = useContext(UserContext) const paperStyle = { margin: '0 auto' } const avatarStyle = { backgroundColor: 'lightseagreen' } const btnstyle = { marginTop: '8px', marginBottom: '8px' } const linkButton = { marginTop: '8px' } return ( <>
Forgot Password Email setForgotEmail(e.target.value)} required/> {/* */}

Login

 setEmail(e.target.value)} placeholder='Enter your email' fullWidth required /> setPassword(e.target.value)} placeholder='Enter your password' fullWidth required /> {/* } label="Primary" /> */} Sign in with Google Forget password? Do you have an account?  Sign up?
) } export default Login
